content:
Projet réalisé dans le cadre de la Perpignan Game Jam 2023, avec pour thème “Abandoned Places”, et pour contrainte principale jouer avec un contrôleur alternatif.
Bob et sa fidèle équipière Laïka plonge dans les profondeurs guidé par leur ordinateur de bord MEL.
Pilotez leur sous-marin en utilisant vos joysticks (ou les flèches) pour activer les turbines. Dans le cadre de la Game Jam, nous avons utiliser des ventilateurs d’ordinateur en guise de contrôleur, deux joueurs devaient alors souffler pour activer leur turbine respectif.
title: Hydro-MEL

content: C’est le zbeul, les Dieux ont déchaîné leur colère sur le monde, maintenant englouti par les eaux suite à un violent cataclysme. C’est à Noé, à la barre de son arche colossale, de sauver ce qu’il reste des habitants de la Terre ! En parcourant les flots capricieux, sauvez un maximum d’animaux avant qu’ils ne meurrent d’hypothermie !
title: Juice

content:
To commission me, read and agree my T.O.S (Terms of services)
Read before ordering all artworks are for personal use only (please contact me for commercial licensing) 💜 I-Contact:
Via my socials or please use the form
language spoken :
French English Portuguese (Brazilian) Spanish 💜 II- Common Sense:
Be polite No spaming the rights to decline commissions at my discretion 💜 III-Payment:
All payments are upfront I take Paypal and bank transfer Prices are non-negotiable 💜 IV-What do I draw?
I draw :
safe for work material
Any species (real or fantasy) Anthropomorphic characters Feral Toony Kid’s illustration Chibis Pets _ NSFW material +18:_
erotism/explicit NSFW/ BDSM / Kinks I don’t draw:
Réalism Humans complex backgrounds Some fetishism as watersports, scat, vomit… 💜 V- Ordering:
I’ll add you on my Trello (waiting list). You have to be over 18 y/o to be able to commission me an NSFW artwork Payement will be on Paypal or bank transfer. -Send me one or multiple references of your character , or describe it as much as possible. Sketch validation. You can ask as many modification as you please without any charges After the sketch, i’ll send you the line art. Charges may applu , if you ask for major changes I will then send you the finish product 💜 VI- The Waiting list:
All potential customer will be put in here. There is no engagement until the commission is fully paid. Even though there is no engagement , it would be nice to notify me in case of cancellation or delaying the project. 💜 VII- Cancellation:
No refund in general. I’m only providing refunds only if I’m unable to finish he project 💜 VIII- Delivery:
I’ll keep you uptdated on my progression as much as possible.
Waiting time will depend of your position on the waiting list (post payement)
I don’t have any defined deadlines, I will try to work as fast as I can!
If you want your artwork to be delivered at a defined date (birthday,christmas…), please notify me (extra fees may apply)
💜 IX - Don’t :
Remove my signature from my finished artwork Make unauthorized modifications 💜 X: Extras:
Don’t forget to credit me I will repost all the drawings on my socials and most likely on my pricelist If it’s a gift don’t forget to notify me, so I don’t post it at my socials and spoil the surprise. You give me feed backs -Contact me , if you have any questions!
title: T.O.S (Terms of services)
